trends: There have been 59 other sightings in Tulsa
There were no other sightings in Tulsa on or around June 27th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsthis even occurred about 20 minuets ago, the memory is fresh. i was driving home about 12:04 when i looked over at the moon (southern part of the sky) I saw 3 orange points of light moving from south to north. i pulled over on the side of the road and stepped out of the car to watch the event, the objects were silent during the event. I am an armature astronomer, these objects were certainly not any planets, satellites, or shooting stars. the brightest of the objects was about -4. the others about -2 or -3. the objects were at about 25 degrees above the horizon when i first observed them. and were about 35 degrees above the horizon when they faded out and disappeared. the objects were first observed in the south east, and disappeared in the east.
